text: Plungė is a city in Lithuania. It has a population of 18,904 people. Before World War II, Plungė had a large Jewish population. == Twin towns – Sister cities == Plungė is twinned with: * Krasnogorsk, Russia * Menden, Germany * Bjerkreim, Norway * Boxholm, Sweden * Viljandi, Estonia * Tukums, Latvia * Golub-Dobrzyń, Poland * Bruntál, Czech Republic * Huddersfield, England Category:Cities in Lithuania
title: Plungė
